articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Message of Sympathy from President of Mozambique
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Kim Jong Un from President of Mozambique
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a message of sympathy from Filipe Jacinto Nwussi, president of the Republic of Mozambique, on Oct. 17. 
					 The president in the message said that he heard sad news that there happened losses of lives and flood-inflicted inhabitants and destruction of important economic and social infrastructure and huge arable lands in the northern part of North Hamgyong Province of the DPRK owing to flood. 
					
					 He expressed deep condolences to the Korean people and victims who suffered natural disaster on behalf of the government and people of Mozambique and on his own behalf.
					
					 He expressed solidarity of the government and people of Mozambique with the government and people of the DPRK with regard to the flood damage and hoped that consequences of damage will successfully and quickly be cleared up during the 200-day campaign.

articles.title: DPRK Rejects Anti-DPRK "Open Statement" of International Financial Supervisory Body
articles.content:
DPRK Rejects Anti-DPRK "Open Statement" of International Financial Supervisory Body
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the National Coordinating Committee of the DPRK for Anti-Money Laundering and Combating the Financing of Terrorism gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Wednesday in connection with the fact that the U.S. and its vassal forces are inciting the atmosphere of putting financial sanctions on the DPRK even by setting in motion the international financial supervision organization:
					 The plenary meeting of the Financial Action Task Force on Anti-Money Laundering that was held in Paris from Oct. 19 to 21 adopted again a "public statement" in which the DPRK was listed as "a state subject to countermeasures".
					
					 We strongly denounce and reject the "public statement" full of hostility toward the DPRK as part of the moves of the U.S. and its vassal forces to impose sanctions on the DPRK and stifle it.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that they are enforcing the UN Security Council's "resolutions on sanctions" on the DPRK upon the UN member nations as an "international standard" by letting the organization throw away "universality" and "impartiality", the principles called for by it in its activities.
					
					 The UNSC's "resolutions on sanctions" on the DPRK are illegal documents cooked up by the U.S. and its vassal forces to encroach upon the independence and the right to existence of the sovereign state in defiance of the UN Charter and the norms of international law, and a product of criminal acts against humanity and human rights.
					
					 Out of its consistent stand against money laundering and financial support for terrorism and the proliferation of the weapons of mass destruction, the DPRK, in close collaboration with the Asia-Pacific Regional Group on Money Laundering, took almost all action measures consistent with international standard such as the adoption of the Law on Anti-Money Laundering and Combating Financing of Terrorism, modification and supplementation of the criminal law and enhancement of the responsibility and role of financial information and supervision institutions. It also has fulfilled its responsibilities by submitting detailed reports on them to the international financial supervision organization.
					
					 However, the plenary meeting of the organization adopted the "open statement" envisaging a total stop to banking transactions, not mentioning even a word about the sincere efforts made by the DPRK to implement the international standard, thereby clearly proving that the organization has been abused for the political purposes of the U.S. and its vassal forces to build an international network of financial blockade against the DPRK.
					
					 Under such situation, we will also take necessary countermeasures to cope with it.

articles.title: Girls Footballers Feted
articles.content:
Girls Footballers Feted
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- The State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission of the DPRK gave a reception at Okryu Restaurant Wednesday in congratulation of girls footballers who came back home after winning the title of the 2016 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup.
					 Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission, officials concerned, players, coaches and their family members.
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae in a congratulatory speech said that the achievements made by girls footballers at the 2016 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup greatly encouraged all service personnel and people.
					
					 He called upon players and coaches to make redoubled efforts to create legendary stories about sports by winning one victory after another in international games. 
					
					 Chief Coach Sin Jong Bok and player Pak Hye Gyong in their reply speeches said that they could win the recent world cup in the wake of the 2015 AFC U-16 Women's Championship as they intensified their day-to-day training.
					
					 They vowed to prepare themselves as aces to shoulder upon themselves the future of the Korean women football through intensive training in the future, too.

articles.title: 27th National Exhibition of IT Achievements Opens
articles.content:
27th National Exhibition of IT Achievements Opens
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- The 27th national exhibition of IT achievements was opened with due ceremony at the Sci-Tech Complex on Wednesday.
					 On display there are more than 1,300 application programs for Korean-style operating systems.
					
					 It is divided into professional and amateur groups. It involves 15 panels including information security, artificial intelligence and Korean language information processing, equipment and production process control and information communication.
					
					 The exhibition will also involve contests in different fields including computer-aided integrated production system and programs for analyzing mock sports games. 
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Choe Thae Bok, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned and program developers.

articles.title: Scientific and Technological Presentation in Field of Pharmacy and Medical Appliances Held
articles.content:
Scientific and Technological Presentation in Field of Pharmacy and Medical Appliances Held
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- A national scientific and technological presentation took place at the Sci-Tech Complex on Oct. 25 and 26.
					 Present there were officials, teachers and researchers of Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University, the Bioengineering Branch of the State Academy of Sciences, the Korean Koryo Medicine Technology Agency, the South Phyongan Provincial People's Hospital and the Pyongyang Electronic Medical Appliances Factory and in the fields of education, science and public health.
					
					 The presentation was divided into panels of pharmacy and medical appliances. Introduced there were at least 70 scientific and technological achievements made in the researches to put the production of medicines and medical appliances on a modern and scientific basis.
					
					 Drawing attention of the participants were papers dealing with the successes made in settling issues arising in studying and developing efficacious medicines, latest medical treatment equipment and medical appliances.

articles.title: National Symposium on Seed Potato Production Held
articles.content:
National Symposium on Seed Potato Production Held
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- A national symposium on seed potato production in the DPRK was held at the Pyongyang Vegetable Science Institute of the Academy of Agricultural Science on Oct. 25 and 26.
					 Present there were officials and researchers of ministries, national institutions and in the fields of scientific research, education and relative units and staff members of the mission of the European Union Program Support in Pyongyang.
					
					 The speakers said that the research into potato seed is brisk in the DPRK now at a time when demand for potato, heath and macrobiotic food, is on the daily increase worldwide, adding that its vitality is being displayed in production.
					
					 The symposium will offer an important occasion in swapping successes and experience gained in the field of potato seed selection and reenergizing mutual cooperation and exchange, they noted.
					
					 They briefed the participants on the issues arising in establishing the system of potato seed selection and sharply increasing its production.

articles.title: Sci-Tech Presentation in Field of Veterinary Science and Animal Husbandry Held
articles.content:
Sci-Tech Presentation in Field of Veterinary Science and Animal Husbandry Held
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- A national sci-tech presentation in the field of veterinary science and animal husbandry took place at the Sci-Tech Complex on Oct. 25 and 26 under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the  General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 Present there were teachers, researchers, technicians and field officials of Kim Il Sung University, Phyongsong University of Veterinary Science and Animal Husbandry, the Stockbreeding Management Bureau of the Ministry of Agriculture, the Institute of Animal Husbandry, the Veterinary Institute and the Poultry Engineering of the Academy of Agricultural Science, the Pyongyang Poultry Production Bureau and other units.
					
					 Presented there were at least 120 papers.
					
					 Drawing attention of the participants were achievements substantially conducive to securing good domestic animal breed, ensuring sufficient feed, making scientific raising and tending and taking thoroughgoing veterinary and anti-epidemic measures.

articles.title: News of Recovery Effort in Flood-hit Hoeryong City of DPRK
articles.content:
News of Recovery Effort in Flood-hit Hoeryong City of DPRK
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons of the DPRK are now speeding up the construction of houses and public buildings at the final stage in Hoeryong City, one of the flood-hit areas in North Hamgyong Province.
					 They had already finished the exterior plastering for more than 1 760 flats and 10-odd public buildings, including schools, kindergartens and nurseries. 
					
					 They started painting their outside walls and covering the roofs with colored iron sheet all at once on October 24.
					
					 At present, the plastering of walls and ceilings is going on at 65 percent and 50 percent each. And such works as tile-setting, fixing windows and rezoning of surroundings were launched at the same time.

articles.title: New Records Set in People's Games of DPRK
articles.content:
New Records Set in People's Games of DPRK
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- New national records were set in shooting, archery and weightlifting events of the 13th People's Games now under way in the DPRK.
					 The Defense Sports Team of the Korean People's Army renewed the records in men's team 10-meter air rifle shots, men's team 10-meter running target mixed event and women's individual and team archery events.
					
					 An athlete from the Pyongyang Sports Team broke the April record in men's 94 kg weightlifting.

articles.title: News of 13th People's Games in DPRK
articles.content:
News of 13th People's Games in DPRK
Pyongyang, October 26 -- The 13th People's Games is going on at stadiums and gymnasiums in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK, amid the deep interest of all citizens. The games are divided into two sections, one of professional teams and another of amateur teams.
					 In professional section, competitions have been conducted so far in more than 20 events, including Taekwon-Do, basketball and sea games.
					
					 New national records were set in shooting, archery and weightlifting events and high skills displayed in rhythmic gymnastics, heavy gymnastics and trampoline events.
					
					 Admirable results were also made in swimming, wrestling, rowing, canoe, water skiing, diving and other events.
					
					 In amateur section, too, stiff competitions are made in traditional games, including swinging and seesawing, and football, volleyball, basketball and other events by teams from provinces and municipalities.
					
					 Pang Mun Il, department director of the Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports, told KCNA that the People's Games is giving a great encouragement to all the people out in the 200-day campaign.

articles.title: Only Disgrace and Death Await Confrontation Maniac, Dictator: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Only Disgrace and Death Await Confrontation Maniac, Dictator: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Chung Hee, "yusin" dictator, was shot to death by his lackey on Oct. 26, 1979. This was an inescapable fate for the rare quisling. Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in an article.
					 The extreme political confusion created by the country-selling rule of traitor Park Geun Hye and the serious ruling crisis of the dictatorial regime are reminiscent of the situation 37 years back, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The crisis which Park Geun Hye is now facing is an inevitable result of the unpardonable crimes she has committed by reviving "yusin" dictatorship and escalating the confrontation with the north with the backing of foreign forces.
					
					 Her sycophant and treacherous quality is putting even her father into the shade.
					
					 Park Geun Hye has turned the cradle of fellow countrymen into the hotspot area where a nuclear war may break out anytime as the special-class stooge of the U.S. and part of a shock brigade for igniting a war against the north. This is the worst crime committed by her.
					
					 She is resorting to an unpopular tyrannical politics by copying the rule of the "yusin" dictator.
					
					 The "agreement" related to the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army made by the Park group at the end of last year, inflicting painful wounds on the south Korean people, is, in essence, just the same as the south Korea-Japan "agreement" Park Chung Hee concluded with his Japanese master under the pressure of the U.S. in 1965.
					
					 As seen above, Park Geun Hye is hatching even despicable political plots in quest of long-term office just as what her father did.
					
					 She is destined to face the same tragic fate as that of her father in the closing period of her office as she has done everything the way the "yusin" dictator did.
					
					 With nothing can she escape her miserable fate already sealed.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Flays S. Korean Puppet Forces' Multi-national Mine Warfare Drill
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Flays S. Korean Puppet Forces' Multi-national Mine Warfare Drill
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces together with the U.S. staged multi-national mine warfare drill in the South Sea of Korea from Oct. 15 to 22 with the involvement of forces of UK and other satellite countries which took part in the past Korean war, The provocative maneuver was staged under the simulated conditions of "securing sea lanes in contingency" with mine laying and sweeping ships, helicopters and huge forces involved.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday ridicules the above-said multi-national mine warfare drill as a foolish saber-rattling and reckless provocation made by those taken aback by the tremendous military muscle of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army.
					
					 The frequent war rehearsals being staged by the Park Geun Hye group against fellow countrymen by introducing forces from different countries only go to prove the strong strategic position of the DPRK based on the ever-growing nuclear deterrence for self-defense, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The puppet warmongers should clearly know who their rival is.
					
					 No matter how frequently the puppet forces stage such multi-national mine warfare drills, they will prove ineffective in the face of the revolutionary Paektusan army equipped with powerful striking means capable of resolutely meeting the challenges of the hostile aggressor  forces.
					
					 If the Park Geun Hye group of traitors dare provoke the DPRK, oblivious of their history of bitter defeat, the DPRK will clearly show the warmongers the might of the Songun army.

articles.title: Support Rate for Park Geun Hye Continues to Drop
articles.content:
Support Rate for Park Geun Hye Continues to Drop
Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- Support rate for Park Geun Hye continues to go down with the disclosure of a series of power-backed scandals, according to the south Korean CBS on October 21.
					 A south Korean public poll organ said support rate for Park's administration went down one percent lower as compared with that of the past week.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Exposes Park Geun Hye Regime's Unpopular Rule
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Exposes Park Geun Hye Regime's Unpopular Rule
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- A south Korean online paper carried an article on Oct. 20.
					 It said that crisis and disasters are going on after the Park Geun Hye regime took office.
					
					 It noted that not only experts but also ordinary citizens think that south Korea under the Park rule is an instable and dangerous society.

articles.title: S. Korean Opposition Parties Denounce Park Geun Hye for Hiding Power-related Scandal Perpetrators Abroad
articles.content:
S. Korean Opposition Parties Denounce Park Geun Hye for Hiding Power-related Scandal Perpetrators Abroad
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- Newsis of south Korea said opposition parties of south Korea denounced traitor Park Geun Hye for hiding power-related scandal perpetrators in a foreign country.
					 The representative of the Minju Party on Oct. 24 at the "National Assembly" urged Park Geun Hye to summon Choe Sun Sil who is in hiding in a foreign country and bring her under prosecution's investigation if Park's intention to severely punish her is true.
					
					 He said it is natural for Park to make an apology for power-related scandals owing to her failure of administration, incompetence and illegality.
					
					 On the same day the chairman of the emergency measure committee of the Kukmin Party said Park Geun Hye let Choe Sun Sil and her daughter hide overseas and showed the prosecution the orientation of investigating the scandal-tainted Mir and K sports foundations.

articles.title: S. Korean Priest Arrested for His Sexual Crime Abroad
articles.content:
S. Korean Priest Arrested for His Sexual Crime Abroad
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- A south Korean priest was arrested by the Cambodian police for committing unethical crime against girls in the country, according to the south Korean paper Seoul Economic Daily on October 21.
					 The priest allured nearly 10 girls, aged between 11 and 16, from their parents and committed sexual assaults against them in a church for the past six years, the Cambodian police said, adding that he sold one of them to another south Korean.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Regime Comes under Fire for Pulling Up DPRK over "Issue of Wartime S. Korean Abductees"
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Regime Comes under Fire for Pulling Up DPRK over "Issue of Wartime S. Korean Abductees"
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet regime staged recently what it called a ground-breaking ceremony for "memorial for June 25 wartime south Korean abductees" in Phyonghwa Nuri Park of Rimjin Pavilion in Phaju City, Kyonggi Province.
					 That day Hong Yong Phyo, puppet minister of Unification, in his address talked such nonsense that "the issue of wartime south Korean abductees is the one concerning ethics and moral laws to be settled at any cost" and it is necessary to "probe the truth behind the abduction of the south Koreans". He went the lengths of letting out a flurry of such vituperation that "the north, which inflicted a lot of wounds and pain upon our nation through the June 25 war, is still perpetrating provocations" and that "it is necessary to force the north to correct its wrong thinking."
					
					 Not content with this, he cried out for "quickly completing 'report on the truth behind south Korean abductees,' a collection of information gathered over the past five years so that it may be recorded in history," disclosing his black-hearted intention to more recklessly resort to the anti-DPRK confrontational moves over the "issue of wartime south Korean abductees".
					
					 A spokesman for the Consultative Council of Former South Korean Public Figures in the North for the Promotion of Peaceful Reunification in a statement on Wednesday condemned this as another unpardonable, very grave political provocation against the DPRK and an unbearable insult to those who came over to the north. The statement went on:
					
					 The "wartime south Korean abductees" touted by the puppet forces are those who voluntarily came to the DPRK in quest of the genuine road of truth and worthy life, infuriated by the war ignited by the U.S. and the Syngman Rhee puppet clique against the north and disillusioned with the colonial rule enforced by them during the past Fatherland Liberation War".
					
					 As far as the "abduction issue" is concerned, the puppet group is the chief culprit of hideous abductions and worst human rights abuser.
					
					 It was none other than the U.S. and the puppet group which forcibly took away a large number of people to south Korea through "A-bomb" threat and blackmail during the June 25 Korean war and forced so many families to live separated from each other for several decades and it was again the group of traitors which unhesitatingly committed the unethical acts of abducting citizens of the DPRK in broad daylight including 12 women employees whom they keep in custody even this time.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces' allurement and abduction of DPRK's citizens have reached their height since Park Geun Hye came to power. 
					
					 Early in March this year traitor Park cooked up the "law on human rights in the north" which her predecessors dared not do and included in it a provision calling on the puppet Ministry of Unification to work out a plan concerning "abductees" and implement it and report its results to the "National Assembly". And she is agitating "defection from the north", personally planning and commanding the abduction of DPRK's inhabitants. 
					
					 It is the height of shamelessness for the criminal abductors to trumpet about "the issue of wartime south Korean abductees" while talking about" ethics" and "moral laws".
					
					 The Park group are getting frantic in the moves for escalating confrontation with the DPRK even by building the "memorial for June 25 wartime south Korean abductees ", prompted by their sinister intention to ratchet up  the "human rights" racket against the DPRK by labeling it "abductor" at any cost and tide over the worst ruling crisis, her biggest headache.
					
					 But it is the last-ditch efforts of the group of traitors to get out of the bottomless abyss of ruin.

articles.title: KBS's Unreasonable Action against Two Mediamen Accused
articles.content:
KBS's Unreasonable Action against Two Mediamen Accused
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed that the KBS of south Korea punished the mediamen for refusing to implement the authorities' instruction to  incite confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north, sparking off public uproar.
					 According to the south Korean paper MT on October 21, in July the chief for cultural programs and the director for news bulletins, etc. of KBS instructed two mediamen to criticize the commentator who made low comment on the anti-DPRK film "Inchon Landing Operation". But they flatly refused to meet this demand, saying "they could not air a biased program." 
					
					 Right after the parliamentary inspection of the administration on October 19 the KBS management side punished those mediamen.
					
					 The KBS headquarters of the Media Trade Union on Oct. 20 made public a statement bitterly denouncing the despicable action.

articles.title: Institutional Measures to Terminate Maltreatment and Killing of Children Demanded
articles.content:
Institutional Measures to Terminate Maltreatment and Killing of Children Demanded by S. Korean Inhabitants
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- The committee for probing truth behind maltreatment and deaths of adopted children in Taegu and Phochon and improving the system of child adoption was formed in south Korea, according to the south Korean online paper Voice of Seoul.
					 An inaugural press conference took place in Taegu on October 21.
					
					 Speakers recalled that two little girls died due to maltreatment at the adopted families, proof that procedures for child adoption in south Korea is loose. 
					
					 They expressed the will to make efforts for thoroughly probing the truth behind the maltreatment and death of the girls and building a proper adoption system.

articles.title: U.S. Arms Buildup in Asia-Pacific Region Denounced
articles.content:
U.S. Arms Buildup in Asia-Pacific Region Denounced
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- The U.S. arms buildup in the Asia-Pacific region is obviously aimed at containing big powers in the region with military edge and building an order whereby everything is settled under its baton, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in an article.
					 The U.S. regards the Korean peninsula as its main target and key region to dominate Asia-Pacific, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is the U.S. calculation that it can put neighboring big powers under its control only when it uses the Korean peninsula as a springboard. That is why the U.S. considers the DPRK as its primary task to grab it. To this end, it is massively introducing latest weapons and equipment into south Korea and its vicinity, while dramatizing the "story of threat" from the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. resorted to nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK in the past, too. But it is something unprecedented that it is staging nuclear bomb-dropping drills as now with ill-famed nuclear strategic bombers involved. 
					
					 The prevailing situation calls on all the countries desirous of world peace and security to sharpen vigilance against the U.S. arms buildup in the Asia-Pacific region and turn out in the struggle to check it.
					
					 The peace-loving DPRK will make every possible effort to prevent the U.S. from igniting a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of the Asia-Pacific region and ensure genuine peace and security there.

articles.title: Cambodian Media Marks Founding Anniversary of WPK
articles.content:
Cambodian Media Marks Founding Anniversary of WPK
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- Cambodian media marked the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on Oct. 8 and 9.
					 AKP cited facts to prove that it is the characteristic of Marshal Kim Jong Un that he does anything at a breath with lightning speed and that his spirit is the one of doing in succession whatever he wants to do, not content of what has been achieved, and the toughest one of startling the world.
					
					 Radio Apsara said that the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU) formed by President Kim Il Sung on Oct. 17, 1926 is the historic roots of the WPK, introducing the immediate task and the ultimate goal of the DIU and referring to the fact that the DIU programme serves as the foundation of the WPK programme.
					
					 It noted that the WPK has rejected foreign domination over the country and interference in its internal affairs in settling all issues and has prioritized the requirements and interests of the country and people since its foundation.
					
					 F.M.90.5 Radio of Cambodia aired the similar contents.
					
					 The Cambodian State Radio said that the lofty ideological and spiritual strength and the noble moral traits of the Korean people are the clear proof of the validity and vitality of the ideological work of the WPK.
					
					 It noted that the WPK has further strengthened the unity in thinking and purpose and morality and obligation based on one ideology and one center and fully demonstrated the ever-victorious might of the guiding force of society.

articles.title: British Social Bodies Protest U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drill
articles.content:
British Social Bodies Protest U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drill
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- The Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist) and the Korean Friendship Association UK on Oct. 21 held demos separately in front of the U.S. embassy and the south Korean puppet embassy in London in protest against the U.S.-south Korea joint military drill against the DPRK.
					 They bitterly denounced the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime for their anti-DPRK moves, chanting slogans "Long Live the Workers' Party of Korea!" "Long Live the Korean People's Army!" "Down with the U.S.!" "Yankees, Go Home!" and "Down with the south Korean puppet regime!"

articles.title: DPRK's Holiday Marked Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Holiday Marked Abroad
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- Russia, Norway, Sweden, Angola and Mali organized celebrations, round-table talks, photo and book exhibitions and reading sessions between Sept. 30 and Oct. 8 on the 71st anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Displayed at the venues of the exhibitions were photos dealing with the revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were their works, and books and photos introducing the struggle of the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Personages of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the "A Just Russia" said Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into an ever-victorious party backed by the popular masses.
					
					 They stressed that the WPK has reliably protected socialism, invariably pursued people-oriented policies and stepped up the building of an economic power for a long period in the face of the sanctions of the U.S. and its vassal forces.
					
					 The chairman of the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway said that the WPK has protected the country's sovereignty and led to victory the Korean people's struggle for socialist construction for decades since its founding, adding: We will as ever extend invariable support and solidarity to the just cause of the Korean party and people.
					
					 The chairperson of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association noted that the WPK, the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, has shaped its way and advanced it independently and creatively for over 7 decades and accomplished the ideological and volitional unity and cohesion of the whole Party.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events held in Norway and Sweden.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de consuelo de Filipe Jacinto Nwussi
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de consuelo de Filipe Jacinto Nwussi
Pyongyang, 26 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Jong Un, recibio un mensaje de consuelo que le enviara el dia 17 el Presidente de la Republica de Mozambique, Filipe Jacinto Nwussi. 
					El texto senala como sigue:
					
					Me he informado de la triste noticia de que las inundaciones causaron muchas perdidas humanas y habitantes damnificados en las zonas septentrionales de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte destruyendo importantes infraestructuras economicas y sociales y extensas areas cultivables. 
					
					Expreso sentidas condolencias al pueblo coreano y a las victimas directas del desastre natural, en nombre del gobierno y pueblo de la Republica de Mozambique y en el mio propio. 
					
					Manifestando la solidaridad del gobierno y pueblo de la Republica de Mozambique con el gobierno y pueblo de la RPDC, deseo que se eliminen exitosa y rapidamente las consecuencias del siniestro natural en el periodo de la campana de 200 dias.

articles.title: Una entidad coreana rechaza "declaracion publica" del Cuerpo Internacional de Supervision Financiera
articles.content:
Una entidad coreana rechaza "declaracion publica" del Cuerpo Internacional de Supervision Financiera
Pyongyang, 26 de octubre (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea formulada en relacion con que los Estados Unidos y sus fuerzas seguidoras crean el ambiente de sancion financiera contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea introduciendo hasta el Cuerpo Internacional de Supervision Financiera, el portavoz del Comite Coordinador Nacional de la RPDC por el Anti-Lavado de Dinero y Contra la Financiacion del Terrorismo dio el dia 26 la respuesta siguiente:
					En la reciente reunion plenaria de la Fuerza Atareada de Accion Financiera contra el Lavado de Dinero, Cuerpo Internacional de Supervision Financiera, efectuada del dia 19 al 21 en Paris, Francia, volvio a aprobarse la "declaracion publica" que designa a la RPDC como "pais objeto de la contramedida".
					
					Rechazamos fuertemente este documento, penetrado de la hostilidad a la RPDC, como una parte de las maniobras de sancion y presion de EE.UU. y sus satelites contra la RPDC.
					
					Lo que no se puede pasar por alto, es que EE.UU. y sus lacayos convierten las "resoluciones de sancion" anti-RPDC del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU en las "normas internacionales" y las imponen de manera coercitiva a los paises miembros de esa organizacion internacional, menospreciando la "universalidad" y la "imparcialidad" de las actividades de las organizaciones.
					
					Las "resoluciones de sancion" anti-RPDC del CS de la ONU, devienen los documentos ilegales adoptados por EE.UU. y sus satelites menospreciando la Carta de la ONU y las normas de la ley internacional y violando la soberania y el derecho a vivir del Estado soberano, y el producto de sus actos antieticos y anti-derechos humanos.
					
					Partiendo de la invariable posicion contra el lavado de dinero y el ofrecimiento del dinero por el terrorismo y la proliferacion de armas mortiferas, hemos tomado casi todas las medidas de accion de acuerdo con las normas internacionales como la aprobacion de la ley contra el lavado de dinero y la financiacion de terrorismo, la enmienda y adicion de codigos penales y el mejoramiento de las responsabilidades y los papeles de las instituciones de informacion y supervision financieras. Ademas, hemos presentado cada ano al Cuerpo Internacional de Supervision Financiera los informes detallando su estado. De esta manera, hemos cumplido con nuestra responsabilidad.
					
					A pesar de esto, la citada reunion plenaria adopto la "declaracion publica", cuyo contenido persigue la interrupcion total de la transaccion bancaria sin referir nada a los esfuerzos sinceros de la RPDC orientados a la ejecucion de las normas internacionales, de modo que demostro por si mismo que la organizacion esta malempleada en el objetivo politico de EE.UU. y sus satelites que intentan establecer una red internacional de bloqueo financiero.
					
					En esta situacion la RPDC tomara las contramedidas necesarias.

articles.title: Inaugurada 27a Exposicion Nacional de Exitos de IT
articles.content:
Inaugurada 27a Exposicion Nacional de Exitos de IT
Pyongyang, 26 de octubre (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurada la 27a Exposicion Nacional de Exitos de IT.
					En la ocasion fueron presentados mas de mil 300 programas de aplicacion para el sistema de operacion desarrollado por el estilo coreano.
					
					Los programas fueron exhibidos dividiendose en 15 secciones y en la categoria de especialistas y la de no profesionales.
					
					Durante el certamen, tendran lugar los concursos de programas para diferentes ramas.
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 26 en el Palacio de Ciencias y Tecnicas la ceremonia inaugural con la participacion del vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Thae Bok, y los funcionarios interesados y los programadores.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun rechaza aumento armamentista de EE.UU. en Asia-Pacifico
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun rechaza aumento armamentista de EE.UU. en Asia-Pacifico
Pyongyang, 26 de octubre (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual de este miercoles, el diario Rodong Sinmun revela que el aumento armamentista de EE.UU. en la region de Asia-Pacifico persigue el objetivo de mantener a raya a las potencias regionales con la superioridad militar y establecer en la region el nuevo orden en que lo todo este bajo su control. 
					EE.UU. considera la Peninsula Coreana como rumbo principal de ataque y zona mas importante para tomar la hegemonia sobre la region de Asia-Pacifico, senala el articulista y continua:
					
					El imperio presenta como su primera tarea apoderarse de la RPDC porque piensa que si toma la Peninsula Coreana, podra doblegar a las potencias regionales usandola como trampolin. 
					
					Para ese fin, introduce en el suelo surcoreano y su contorno sofisticados pertrechos de guerra difundiendo al extremo el "rumor de amenaza" proveniente de la RPDC. 
					
					La amenaza y chantaje nucleares de EE.UU. contra la RPDC persisten desde hace mucho tiempo, pero ahora se reporta el peor caso en que tienen lugar hasta los ejercicios de lanzamiento de bomba nuclear por parte de los bombarderos estrategicos norteamericanos que se introducen seguidamente en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					La realidad demanda que los paises aspirantes a la paz y la seguridad del mundo eleven la vigilancia sobre el aumento armamentista de EE.UU. en Asia-Pacifico y libren la lucha por frenarlo. 
					
					La RPDC pacifista hara todo lo posible por preservar la paz y seguridad previniendo la guerra nuclear que persigue EE.UU. en la Peninsula Coreana y el resto de Asia-Pacifico.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena ejercicios multinacionales de la batalla con minas
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena ejercicios multinacionales de la batalla con minas
Pyongyang, 26 de octubre (ACNC) -- Los titeres surcoreanos libraron en el Mar Sur de Corea el entrenamiento multinacional de la batalla con minas junto con Estados Unidos y sus satelites, que participaron en la pasada guerra coreana, como Gran Bretana.
					En esta maniobra, efectuada desde el dia 15 hasta el 22 con la movilizacion de buques lanzaminas y dragaminas de varios tipos, helicopteros y muchas otras fuerzas armadas, los belicistas inculcaron el ambiente de guerra bajo el cartel de "preparar la ruta de transito maritimo en el tiempo de emergencia".
					
					Es otra locura provocativa de los acobardados ante el inagotable poderio de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias del monte Paektu.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este miercoles y prosigue:
					
					Si bien la banda de Park Geun-hye se esfuerza mucho por involucrar a las fuerzas foraneas en sus actos para perjudicar a la connacional RPDC, esto no da otro resultado que comprobar la solida posicion estrategica de esta que se basa en su creciente disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa.
					
					Los belicistas surcoreanos deben conocer bien quien es su rival.
					
					No valen la pena los referidos ejercicios multinacionales ni los otros porque el poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu esta equipado con medios de golpe capaces de frustrar tajantemente el desafio agresivo de las fuerzas hostiles.
					
					Si la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye se atreve a provocar olvidando la historia de su derrota amarga, demostraremos el poderio de las fuerzas armadas del Songun a esos maniacos de guerra.
